Mildred Loving (June 22, 1939–May 2, 2008) 그 옆은 남편 Richard Perry Loving (October 29, 1933–June 29, 1975)

June 12 has become known as Loving Day in the United States, a day of celebration of mixed-race marriages

post.content: Anyone remembers who this lady is?
